prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (stoic Japanese martial artist:1.2), strong facial features, messy black hair, determined intense gaze, muscular physique, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (facial stubble and sweat:1.2), individual hair strands, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching weathered white cotton karate gi:1.2), cinematic lighting, film grain, sharp focus
